00025 
00026 // Matrix Transpose Views
00027 
00028 #ifndef TRANSV_H
00029 #define TRANSV_H
00030 
00031 #include <iostream>
00032 #include <cassert>
00033 #include "tnt/vec.h"
00034 
00035 namespace TNT
00036 {
00037 
00038 template <class Array2D>
00039 class Transpose_View
00040 {
00041     protected:
00042 
00043         const Array2D &  A_;
00044 
00045     public:
00046 
00047         typedef typename Array2D::element_type T;
00048         typedef         T   value_type;
00049         typedef         T   element_type;
00050         typedef         T*  pointer;
00051         typedef         T*  iterator;
00052         typedef         T&  reference;
00053         typedef const   T*  const_iterator;
00054         typedef const   T&  const_reference;
00055 
00056 
00057         const Array2D & array()  const { return A_; }
00058         Subscript num_rows() const { return A_.num_cols();}
00059         Subscript num_cols() const { return A_.num_rows();}
00060         Subscript lbound() const { return A_.lbound(); }
00061         Subscript dim(Subscript i) const
00062         {
00063 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00064             assert( A_.lbound() <= i);
00065             assert( i<= A_.lbound()+1);
00066 #endif
00067             if (i== A_.lbound())
00068                 return num_rows();
00069             else
00070                 return num_cols();
00071         }
00072 
00073 
00074         Transpose_View(const Transpose_View<Array2D> &A) : A_(A.A_) {};
00075         Transpose_View(const Array2D &A) : A_(A) {};
00076 
00077 
00078         inline const typename Array2D::element_type & operator()(
00079             Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00080         {
00081 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00082         assert(lbound()<=i);
00083         assert(i<=A_.num_cols() + lbound() - 1);
00084         assert(lbound()<=j);
00085         assert(j<=A_.num_rows() + lbound() - 1);
00086 #endif
00087 
00088             return A_(j,i);
00089         }
00090 
00091 
00092 };
00093 
00094 template <class Matrix>
00095 Transpose_View<Matrix> Transpose_view(const Matrix &A)
00096 {
00097     return Transpose_View<Matrix>(A);
00098 }
00099 
00100 template <class Matrix, class T>
00101 Vector<T> matmult(
00102     const Transpose_View<Matrix> & A, 
00103     const Vector<T> &B)
00104 {
00105     Subscript  M = A.num_rows();
00106     Subscript  N = A.num_cols();
00107 
00108     assert(B.dim() == N);
00109 
00110     Vector<T> x(N);
00111 
00112     Subscript i, j;
00113     T tmp = 0;
00114 
00115     for (i=1; i<=M; i++)
00116     {
00117         tmp = 0;
00118         for (j=1; j<=N; j++)
00119             tmp += A(i,j) * B(j);
00120         x(i) = tmp;
00121     }
00122 
00123     return x;
00124 }
00125 
00126 template <class Matrix, class T>
00127 inline Vector<T> operator*(const Transpose_View<Matrix> & A, const Vector<T> &B)
00128 {
00129     return matmult(A,B);
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00133 template <class Matrix>
00134 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const Transpose_View<Matrix> &A)
00135 {
00136     Subscript M=A.num_rows();
00137     Subscript N=A.num_cols();
00138 
00139     Subscript start = A.lbound();
00140     Subscript Mend = M + A.lbound() - 1;
00141     Subscript Nend = N + A.lbound() - 1;
00142 
00143     s << M << "  " << N << endl;
00144     for (Subscript i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00145     {
00146         for (Subscript j=start; j<=Nend; j++)
00147         {
00148             s << A(i,j) << " ";
00149         }
00150         s << endl;
00151     }
00152 
00153 
00154     return s;
00155 }
00156 
00157 } // namespace TNT
00158 
00159 #endif
